artist: Delineator: Pierre Etienne Falconet; Engraver: D. P. Pariset; Publisher: William Wynne Ryland
description: left profile of King Christian VII of Denmark wearing a sash across chest and star shaped badge on chest
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and  Inscription
on sheet in black: CHRISTIAN VII / KING OF DENMARK / P. Falconet del 1768  D.P. Pariset sculp. / Drawn from life / Published according to Act of Parliament, August 23, 1768 by P. Falconet in Broad Street Carnaby Market & Ryland & Bryer Cornhill pr 2s | on sheet in pencil: 2-687
title: Christian VII, King of Denmark
